meanings.sent1: After drinking soda quickly, he eructated loudly in class.
meanings.sent2: The man eructated after finishing a big meal.
meanings.sent3: The dog eructated at the dinner table, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: The volcano eructated smoke and ash into the sky.
meanings.sent5: She eructated with such force that it echoed in the room.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, he eructated after eating too fast.
meanings.sent2: She eructated loudly during the party last night.
meanings.sent3: The baby eructated right after finishing the bottle.
meanings.sent4: The old car eructated smoke as it struggled up the hill.
